description: Provides rich language support for AsciiDoc.
cmd.asciidoc.exportAsPDF.title: Export document as PDF
cmd.asciidoc.pasteImage.title: Paste Image
cmd.asciidoc.preview.title: Open Preview
cmd.asciidoc.preview.refresh.title: Refresh Preview
cmd.asciidoc.preview.toggleLock.title: Toggle Preview Locking
cmd.asciidoc.previewSide.title: Open Preview to the Side
cmd.asciidoc.showLockedPreviewToSide.tit: Open Locked Preview to the Side
cmd.asciidoc.showSource.title: Show Source
conf.asciidoc.asciidoctor_command.desc: Full path for the asciidoctor binary/executable
conf.asciidoc.asciidoctorpdf_command.des: Full path for the asciidoctor binary/executable
conf.asciidoc.preview.attributes.desc: Set attributes to be used in the preview. Attributes need to be written as an object of type {string: string}
conf.asciidoc.preview.breaks.desc:
Sets how line-breaks are rendered in the AsciiDoc preview. Setting it to 'true' creates a
for every newline.
conf.asciidoc.preview.doubleClickToSwitc: Double click in the AsciiDoc preview to switch to the editor.
conf.asciidoc.preview.fontFamily.desc: Controls the font family used in the AsciiDoc preview.
conf.asciidoc.preview.fontSize.desc: Controls the font size in pixels used in the AsciiDoc preview.
conf.asciidoc.preview.lineHeight.desc: Controls the line height used in the AsciiDoc preview. This number is relative to the font size.
conf.asciidoc.preview.linkify.desc: Enable or disable conversion of URL-like text to links in the AsciiDoc preview.
conf.asciidoc.preview.markEditorSelectio: Mark the current editor selection in the AsciiDoc preview.
conf.asciidoc.preview.scrollEditorWithPr: When an AsciiDoc preview is scrolled, update the view of the editor.
conf.asciidoc.preview.scrollPreviewWithE: When an AsciiDoc editor is scrolled, update the view of the preview.
[Deprecated] Scrolls the AsciiDoc preview to reveal the currently selected line from the editor.
This setting has been replaced by 'asciidoc.preview.scrollPreviewWithEditor' and no longer has any effect.
conf.asciidoc.preview.style.desc: The local path to a CSS style sheet to use in the AsciiDoc preview. Relative paths are interpreted relative to the workspace folder.
conf.asciidoc.preview.useEditorStyle.des: Use editor style instead of default ascidoctor.css
conf.asciidoc.previewFrontMatter.desc: Sets how YAML front matter should be rendered in the AsciiDoc preview. 'hide' removes the front matter. Otherwise, the front matter is treated as AsciiDoc content.
conf.asciidoc.trace.desc: Enable debug logging for the AsciiDoc extension.
conf.asciidoc.use_asciidoctor_js.desc: Use asciidoctor js instead of the 'asciidoctor_command'
conf.asciidoc.use_asciidoctorpdf.desc: Use asciidoctor-pdf instead of the integrated renderer
conf.asciidoc.forceUnixStyleSeparator.de: Force set the file separator style to unix style. If set false, separator style will follow the system style.
How should clicking on links to AsciiDoc files be handled in the preview.
Try to open links in the editor
Try to open links in the the AsciiDoc preview
